description:
April 1999. Jotaro Kujo arrives to Morioh Town in search of someone named Higashikata, and ends up running into a young man surrounded by delinquents. Jotaro then finds out that his name is Josuke Higashikata, and was exactly the person he was looking for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kuujou Joutarou! Higashikata Jousuke ni Au
空条承太郎! 東方仗助に会う
